about_the_game:
Smol Gods is a strategy card game where you must build the strongest hand of gods.

But each god is unique, some synergize with specific other gods, or can be deadened by yet others. Some have powers to activate during battle, and some twist the very rules of the game.

The game plays in two phases:

  • In the draft phase, you must refine your hand by drawing and discarding cards, while your opponent does the same. Discarded cards are placed in the center, where any of the two players can pick them up again instead of drawing a new random card. When the discard zone is full, it's time to fight!

  • In the battle phase, you and your opponent reveal your cards one by one, and activate abilities and synergies to beat each other's total score.

Every time you beat an opponent, you unlock the next difficulty level and a new god. At higher levels, you must play with a larger hand and discard zone.

The game plays entirely with the mouse. It features 80 different cards and 60 designed difficulty levels, after which you can continue and push against a score handicap in additional levels.
